\documentclass[border=0pt]{standalone}

\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage{color}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{pstricks}
\usepackage{anyfontsize}
%option: inverted-with-bg% \usepackage{pagecolor}

\usepackage[default,osfigures,scale=0.95]{opensans} % TUNI font

% purple
\definecolor{myPurple}{RGB}{78,0,142}
%option: purple% \definecolor{main}{RGB}{78,0,142}
%option: inverted-with-bg% \pagecolor{myPurple}

% white
\definecolor{main}{RGB}{255,255,255}

\begin{document}
	\scalebox{
		0.2
	}{		
		\psset{unit=1}
			
		\pspicture*(-5.6,-4)(19,4.2) % Official padding
		
		% frames from left to right
		\psframe[fillstyle=solid,fillcolor=main,linecolor=main,linewidth=0pt](-4.6,0)(-4.2,1)
		\psframe[fillstyle=solid,fillcolor=main,linecolor=main,linewidth=0pt](-3.8,0)(-2.8,0.4)
		\pspolygon[fillstyle=solid,fillcolor=main,linecolor=main,linewidth=0pt](-2.4,0.4)(-1,0.4)(-1,0)(-2,0)(-2,-1.4)(-2.4,-1.4)
		\psframe[fillstyle=solid,fillcolor=main,linecolor=main,linewidth=0pt](-0.6,0.4)(-0.2,-0.8)
			
		%option: en% \rput[lt]{0}(0.82,0.48){\bf{\color{main}{{\fontsize{51}{51}\selectfont Tampere University}}}}
		
		\rput[lt]{0}(0.82,0.48){\bf{\color{main}{{\fontsize{51}{51}\selectfont Tampereen yliopisto}}}}
		\rput[lt]{0}(0.82,-1.3){\bf{\color{main}{{\fontsize{51}{51}\selectfont Tampere University}}}}
		
		% arcs
		
		% left
		\pscustom[fillstyle=solid,fillcolor=main,linecolor=main,linewidth=0pt]{
			\psarc(-2.4,1){1.8}{102.84}{180} % acos (2/9) / 2 / pi * 360
			\psline(-4.2,1)(-4.6,1)
			\psarcn(-2.4,1){2.2}{180}{100.46} % acos (2/11) / 2 / pi * 360
			\closepath
		}
		
		% right
		\pscustom[fillstyle=solid,fillcolor=main,linecolor=main,linewidth=0pt]{
			\psarc(-2.4,-.8){1.8}{-90}{0}
			\psline(-0.6,-.8)(-0.2,0.4)
			\psarcn(-2.4,-.8){2.2}{0}{-90}
			\closepath
		}	
		
		% Circles to help drawing and checking the compatibility with the specification  
		   
		%\pscircle(-2.4,1){2.2}         
		%\pscircle(-2.4,1){1.8}         
		
		%\pscircle(-2.4,-.8){2.2}         
		%\pscircle(-2.4,-.8){1.8}       
		
		% Grid to help drawing
		%\psgrid[gridcolor=lightgray,subgriddiv=5,gridlabels=10pt](0,0)(-10,-10)(20,10)
		%\psaxes[labelFontSize=\scriptscriptstyle]{<->}(0,0)(-10,-10)(10,10)            
		
		\endpspicture
	}
\end{document}
